‚öîÔ∏è The Crimson Prophecy ‚öîÔ∏è

"When the crimson moon rises over the Fallen Kingdom, the ancient seal shall break..."

The party has just discovered that Lord Malachar, the kingdom's trusted advisor, is actually the ancient lich Azaroth the Undying in disguise. The prophecy speaks of a ritual requiring three artifacts: the Orb of Eternal Night, the Blade of the First King, and the Crown of Binding Souls.

With only 12 days until the crimson moon, our heroes must decide: retrieve the artifacts to perform the counter-ritual, or confront Azaroth directly in his fortress beneath the capital.

üåô Crimson Moon Rising12 DAYS

Azaroth's ritual will be complete when the crimson moon reaches its zenith. The kingdom will fall to eternal darkness.

‚öîÔ∏è Army at the Gates5 DAYS

The undead army will reach the capital. Citizens are evacuating. The city guard requests the party's aid.

üîÆ Oracle's Vision Fading3 DAYS

The Oracle of Moonfall can maintain her vision of Azaroth's plans for only 3 more days before her magic fails.

üó°Ô∏è Artifact HuntACTIVE

Three legendary artifacts must be found: Orb (Shadowpeak), Blade (Sunken Crypt), Crown (Royal Vault - heavily guarded).

‚öîÔ∏è MAIN QUEST: Stop Azaroth's Ritual

URGENTLvl 11-13Reward: 15,000 XP

Lord Malachar has been revealed as Azaroth the Undying, an ancient lich. In 12 days, the crimson moon will reach its zenith, and Azaroth will complete a ritual to plunge the kingdom into eternal darkness.

üîÄ CRITICAL DECISION POINT:
PATH A: Retrieve the Three Artifacts

Find the Orb of Eternal Night, Blade of the First King, and Crown of Binding Souls. Use them to perform the counter-ritual and seal Azaroth.

Pro: Permanent solution, saves the kingdom
Con: Three separate dangerous dungeons, tight time limit
Difficulty: Very Hard (DC 18+ checks, CR 12+ encounters)
PATH B: Direct Assault on Azaroth's Fortress

Storm the underground fortress beneath the capital. Fight through his undead army and confront Azaroth before the ritual completes.

Pro: Direct solution, one major battle
Con: Fighting Azaroth (CR 14) without counter-ritual is extremely dangerous
Difficulty: Deadly (CR 14 Lich + CR 10 minions)
PATH C: Rally the Kingdom's Forces

Unite the scattered nobles, recruit the Mage's Guild, and gather the Silver Knights. Launch a coordinated assault while retrieving at least ONE artifact for leverage.

Pro: NPC allies, backup plan, political support
Con: Time-consuming (uses 8 of 12 days), complex coordination
Difficulty: Hard (Charisma checks DC 16+, one artifact quest)

  • ‚úÖ Discovered Malachar's true identity
  • ‚úÖ Learned about the crimson moon prophecy
  • ‚úÖ Found the Oracle of Moonfall (can guide to artifacts)

Progress: Discovered the murder weapon - a black arrow not from the Feywood
Next Step: Track the arrow's origin (clues point to Shadow Thieves Guild)

‚ö° Seraphina's Divine Trial

Personal Quest | Active
7,500 XP

Pelor has tasked you with a divine trial: Destroy an artifact of darkness OR convert a fallen paladin back to the light. Failure means loss of divine powers.

Progress: Located the fallen paladin - Sir Aldren, now serving Azaroth
Next Step: Confront Sir Aldren and attempt redemption (or destroy the Orb of Shadows)
Time Limit: Must complete before the crimson moon (12 days)

items.title: üèõÔ∏è Capital City of Valorhold
items.description: The great walled city, seat of power. Now under martial law. Royal palace infiltrated by Azaroth. Underground catacombs hide his fortress. Population: 50,000. Currently: Party's home base, but growing increasingly dangerous.

items.title: üå≤ The Feywood (Ancient Forest)
items.description: Mystical forest home to druids and fey creatures. Kael's homeland. The Archdruid was murdered here 2 years ago. Ancient ruins of Myth Alanor lie deep within. Gateway to the Feywild.

items.title: ‚õ∞Ô∏è Shadowpeak Mountains
items.description: Treacherous mountain range. Rumored location of the Orb of Eternal Night in the ancient dwarven ruins. Dragon territory. Home to the storm giant clan who may be allies.

items.title: üåä Sunken Crypt of King Aldric I
items.description: Underwater tomb where the Blade of the First King rests. Protected by water elementals and drowned undead. Located in Lake Moonshadow. Requires Water Breathing to access.

items.title: üèõÔ∏è Royal Vault (Beneath Palace)
items.description: Most secure location in the kingdom. The Crown of Binding Souls is kept here. Problem: Azaroth controls the palace. Heavily guarded by undead and corrupted guards. High risk, high reward.

items.title: üíÄ Azaroth's Fortress (The Obsidian Sanctum)
items.description: Ancient underground complex beneath Valorhold. Once a temple to forgotten gods, now Azaroth's seat of power. Filled with undead, traps, and dark magic. Final confrontation location.

üè™ The Wandering Wyrm (Tavern)

Party's favorite tavern in Valorhold. Run by retired adventurer Garrick Ironbelly (dwarf, friendly). Source of rumors and quest hooks. +10% discount on rooms.

üîÆ Moonfall Observatory

Home of the Oracle Celestia. She can see glimpses of the future and past. Helped party discover Azaroth's plan. Vision fades in 3 days. Relationship: Ally (Trust: 85%).

‚öóÔ∏è Madame Vex's Emporium

Magic shop with rare items. Proprietor is a tiefling sorceress with mysterious past. Sells potions, scrolls, minor magical items. Party has 15% discount for past services.

‚öîÔ∏è The Proving Grounds

Arena where warriors test their mettle. Theron won the championship here (Session 7). Can earn gold and reputation. Run by the mysterious "Crimson Mask" (actually a red dragon in disguise).

üé≤ COMBAT SCENARIOS

üò∞ Scenario A: Fight NOW (No Prep)5% WIN CHANCE

Storm Azaroth's fortress immediately with current resources. No artifacts, no NPC allies, fortress fully defended.

Expected Outcome:
  • Azaroth at full power with 8 Wights (CR 10 total minions)
  • Legendary Resistances protect him from best spells
  • Power Word Kill can one-shot any PC with <100 HP
  • Likely TPK (Total Party Kill) within 5 rounds
  • Even if victorious, phylactery unknown = he returns in 1d10 days
‚ö†Ô∏è DM Verdict: Suicidal. Not recommended unless party wants heroic deaths.
ü§î Scenario B: Retrieve ONE Artifact First35% WIN CHANCE

Get Blade of the First King (easiest artifact - 1 day quest), then confront Azaroth. Uses 8 of 12 days.

Expected Outcome:
  • Blade grants wielder immunity to Azaroth's paralyzing touch
  • +2d6 radiant damage vs undead (bypasses resistances)
  • Reduces encounter to HARD difficulty vs DEADLY
  • Still facing Azaroth + 4 Wights (CR 13 total)
  • 50/50 chance of 1-2 PC deaths, but probable victory
  • Phylactery still unknown - need to solve that somehow
üí° DM Verdict: Risky but possible. Good roleplaying opportunity.
üòä Scenario C: Retrieve TWO Artifacts + Allies65% WIN CHANCE

Get Blade (1 day) + Orb (2 days) + recruit Silver Knights (2 days). Total: 5 days used, 7 remaining for confrontation.

Expected Outcome:
  • Orb reveals phylactery location (hidden in Azaroth's throne)
  • Can destroy phylactery mid-combat (prevents rejuvenation)
  • Captain Elara + 10 Silver Knights provide support (tank minions)
  • Knights handle the Wights, party focuses Azaroth
  • Encounter becomes MEDIUM difficulty
  • Likely 0 PC deaths, possible to win without anyone going down
‚úÖ DM Verdict: Recommended approach. Balanced risk/reward.
üéØ Scenario D: ALL THREE ARTIFACTS (Full Prep)85% WIN CHANCE

Retrieve all three artifacts + rally all allies. Uses all 12 days - battle happens ON the crimson moon. Maximum drama.

Expected Outcome:
  • Three artifacts = can perform COUNTER-RITUAL mid-combat
  • Counter-ritual: DC 15 Arcana check, on success Azaroth loses legendary resistances + AC drops to 15
  • Silver Knights + Mage's Guild support (Archmage Silvius joins)
  • Crown allows Seraphina to command Azaroth's undead (turn the Wights against him)
  • Encounter becomes EASY for level 11 party with support
  • Climactic battle on the rooftop as crimson moon rises - cinematic as hell
  • Near-guaranteed victory with ZERO PC deaths
‚≠ê DM Verdict: Epic finale. Requires perfect execution but worth it for story payoff.

items.title: The Crimson Moon Approaches
items.description: Party debates which path to take: artifacts, direct assault, or rally allies. Oracle Celestia reveals only 12 days remain. Finn brings intel about secret passage to Royal Vault. Session ends on cliffhanger vote. XP Earned: 0 (session in progress). Total Party XP: 94,500 / 100,000 to Level 12.

items.title: The Lich Revealed
items.description: Epic confrontation in throne room. Lord Malachar drops disguise, reveals himself as Azaroth. Party barely escapes through Lyra's Dimension Door scroll. Captain Elara provides safe house. XP Earned: 4,500 (major story milestone + narrow escape). MVP: Lyra (clutch save). Total XP: 94,500.

items.title: Shadows in the Palace
items.description: Infiltrated royal palace disguised as nobles during masquerade ball. Found evidence in Malachar's chambers: ancient lich phylactery diagrams, crimson moon calculations. Chased by corrupted guards. XP Earned: 3,800 (stealth mission + discovery). MVP: Kael (perfect Stealth checks). Total XP: 90,000.

items.title: The Oracle's Warning
items.description: Met Oracle Celestia at Moonfall Observatory. She revealed the prophecy and Lord Malachar's true nature. Visions showed the three artifacts and their locations. Party gained crucial intel. XP Earned: 3,200 (major revelation). MVP: Seraphina (earned Oracle's trust). Total XP: 86,200.

items.title: The Frost Giant's Bargain
items.description: Traveled to Shadowpeak Mountains seeking storm giant allies. Instead found frost giant clan. Negotiated peace between giants and nearby dwarven holds (epic diplomacy session). Giants agreed to delay their raids. XP Earned: 8,200 (4 sessions). LEVEL UP to 11! Total XP: 83,000.

items.title: Kael's Betrayal Uncovered
items.description: Found the black arrow that killed the Archdruid - traced to Shadow Thieves Guild. Kael confronted former friend who framed him. Epic rooftop chase through Valorhold. Nearly caught The Shadow Master but he escaped. XP Earned: 4,800 (personal quest progress + boss escape). Total XP: 74,800.

items.title: Champion of the Arena
items.description: Theron entered Proving Grounds tournament to earn coin and reputation. Defeated 8 opponents including armored troll (CR 8 solo). Won championship, earned greatsword of giant slaying as prize. Met the Crimson Mask. XP Earned: 5,200 (tournament + prize). Total XP: 70,000 - LEVEL UP to 10! Tier 3 unlocked.

items.title: Humble Beginnings
items.description: Party meets in The Wandering Wyrm tavern. Garrick hires them to clear rats from his cellar. Rats were actually cultists in disguise performing dark ritual. First hints of larger conspiracy. XP Earned: 1,200 (level 1 start). Total XP: 1,200.
